body_html:
@jdvylder @shoubhik Hey, sorry for the delay. Probably someone from Tensorflow should explain to be certain, but there was a major upgrade to the local training version of train_and_evaluate. My understanding is it now runs evaluation via a tf.train.CheckpointSaverListener. As such, the evaluation frequency is determined by the saving frequency. You can see the new functionality here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/estimator/training.py#L667

I believe the training input pipeline no longer resets per evaluation as a result, too.
